com.bretth.osmosis.core.store
Class StoreWriter

java.lang.Object
  com.bretth.osmosis.core.store.StoreWriter

public class StoreWriter
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used by Storeable classes to persist their state.

Author:
Brett Henderson
